overview: We live in a patriarchal society, where men are always supposed to take on the dominant role, but that's an historic arrangement that doesn't always work well for everyone - men and women included. In fact, some folks really do need the woman to take charge in the bedroom; and if you enjoy the reality of female domination then believe us when we tell you that this horned-up escapade is really going to press all of your buttons. Not least of all when the guys end up being pegged by dildos like the subservient little bitches they truly are. Yeah, take it from us when we say that these girls can't wait to take full advantage of their domineering roles; stretching their husband's arses with merciless energy again and again!
title: I Strap-On My Husband
